turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get four pizzas all four of them large with all of them extra cheese. One pizza can I get a macoronian cheese pizza, the second one can I get a buffalo chicken pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The third, is there Do you guys Do they have a cheeseburger pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yeah. I'll take the cheeseburger pizza. And as for the last pizza, a chicken Alfredo pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's 4 large extra cheese pizzas, one macaroni and cheese, one buffalo chicken, one cheesburger pizza, and one chicken alfredo.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your total is $104.88 and you'll be able to pick them up in 30 minutes. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much for your help. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, you have a great day, bye.
